mapper.select: SELECT EMP_ID, RANK_CODE, DEPT_CODE, JOB_CODE, EMP_CODE, EMP_PWD, EMP_NAME, HIRE_DATE, EMP_EXTENSION, EMP_FAX, EMP_COM_EMAIL, EMP_PRI_EMAIL, EMP_PHONE, EMP_ADDRESS, EMP_ADDRESS_DETAIL, EMP_IMAGE, EMP_BIRTHDAY, RESIGN_FLAG, RESIGN_DATE, EMP_STATUS, RANK_TITLE, DEPT_TITLE, JOB_TITLE FROM EMPLOYEE JOIN DEPARTMENT USING(DEPT_CODE) JOIN RANK USING(RANK_CODE) JOIN JOB USING(JOB_CODE) WHERE EMP_ID=#{empId} AND EMP_CODE IS NOT NULL AND RESIGN_FLAG='N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE VALUES(#{empId}, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, #{empPwd}, #{empName}, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, #{empPriEmail}, #{empPhone}, #{empAddress}, #{empAddressDetail}, NULL, #{empBirthday}, 'N', NULL, NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET EMP_PWD=#{empPwd}, EMP_EXTENSION=#{empExtension}, EMP_FAX=#{empFax}, EMP_NAME=#{empName}, EMP_BIRTHDAY=#{empBirthday}, EMP_PHONE=#{empPhone}, EMP_PRI_EMAIL=#{empPriEmail}, EMP_ADDRESS=#{empAddress}, EMP_ADDRESS_DETAIL=#{empAddressDetail} WHERE EMP_ID=#{empId}
